quote: Help others for all the times that you have been ignored. Be kind to others, for all the times that you have been scorned. – Ming-Dao Deng
fact: Shakespeare is quoted 33,150 times in the Oxford English dictionary.
joke:
Doctor: Do you want to hear the good news or the bad news?
Patient: Good news please.
Doctor: we're naming a disease after you.
